data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saini, Malkiat S., Parey, Sajad H. (2011): Four new species of the genus Lepidostoma Rambur (Trichoptera: Lepidostomatidae) from the Indian Himalayas, with a checklist to its Indian species. Zootaxa 3062: 25-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206992
